ingredients: 4  eggs,   +   1/2 cup unbleached all-purpose flour, 1 tablespoon sugar,   +   1/2 teaspoon baking powder, 1 pinch salt, 1 cup milk, 1 teaspoon vanilla extract, 2 tablespoons unsalted butter, melted,   +   1/2 teaspoon ground nutmeg,   +   1/4 cup unsalted butter,   +   1/2 cup white sugar, divided,   +   1/2 teaspoon ground cinnamon,   +   1/2 teaspoon ground nutmeg, 1 large tart apple - peeled, cored and sliced
nutrition: Total Fat 24g 31%, Saturated Fat 14g 68%, Cholesterol 237mg 79%, Sodium 182mg 8%, Total Carbohydrate 52g 19%, Dietary Fiber 2g 7%, Total Sugars 37g, Protein 10g, Vitamin C 3mg 13%, Calcium 138mg 11%, Iron 2mg 10%, Potassium 243mg 5%
